Uses of Package
de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

  • Packages that use de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans 
    Package Description
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans
    K-means clustering and variations.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.initialization
    Initialization strategies for k-means.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.parallel
    Parallelized implementations of k-means.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.clustering
    Clustering based outlier detection.
    tutorial.clustering
    Classes from the tutorial on implementing a custom k-means variation.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans 
    Class and Description
    AbstractKMeans
    Abstract base class for k-means implementations.
    AbstractKMeans.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    BestOfMultipleKMeans
    Run K-Means multiple times, and keep the best run.
    KMeans
    Some constants and options shared among kmeans family algorithms.
    KMeansBatchedLloyd
    Provides the k-means algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.
    KMeansBisecting
    The bisecting k-means algorithm works by starting with an initial partitioning into two clusters, then repeated splitting of the largest cluster to get additional clusters.
    KMeansHybridLloydMacQueen
    Provides the k-means algorithm, alternating between MacQueen-style incremental processing and Lloyd-Style batch steps.
    KMeansLloyd
    Provides the k-means algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.
    KMeansMacQueen
    Provides the k-means algorithm, using MacQueen style incremental updates.
    KMediansLloyd
    Provides the k-medians clustering algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.
    KMedoidsEM
    Provides the k-medoids clustering algorithm, using a "bulk" variation of the "Partitioning Around Medoids" approach.
    KMedoidsPAM
    Provides the k-medoids clustering algorithm, using the "Partitioning Around Medoids" approach.
    SingleAssignmentKMeans
    Pseudo-k-Means variations, that assigns each object to the nearest center.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.initialization

    Some constants and options shared among kmeans family algorithms.
